title: Day 93: Strengths and Weaknesses (2021)
author: Ascension
itunes:author: Ascension
itunes:subtitle: Today, Fr. Mike begins to read Samson's story and points out that Samson, despite his physical strength, has a lot of weaknesses. The readings are Judges 12-15 and Psalm 146. Please note: The Bible contains adult themes that may not be suitable for children - parental discretion is advised.
description:
Today, Fr. Mike begins to read Samson's story and points out that Samson, despite his physical strength, has a lot of weaknesses. The readings are Judges 12-15 and Psalm 146.
